short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve speed in reading foreign language with over 100+ languages. Just double-click. Dictionary, PDF translate and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy translate website content with just double click!

🚀 Features
  ❤️ Double click to translate
  ❤️ Transform PDF file to translatable when open local PDF file by Chrome
  ⭐️ Transtate for subtitle Youtube, Edx Course
  ⭐️ Text to Speech
  ⭐️ Switch to 4 themes
  ⭐️ Support almost popular language (100+) in the world
  ⭐️ Compatible for almost news website: Reddit, Yahoo News, MSN, CNN,...

Happy reading

Made with ❤️ by Frankie Giap
